item.title: Metalcore playlist for 12/2011
item.description: Including: All That Remains, August Burns Red, Boneyards, Breakdown Of Sanity, Bury Tomorrow, By Blood And Iron, For Today, Miss May I, Numbers, Within The Ruins.
